personal.name: Prashil Bulbule
personal.title: AI Engineer | Machine Learning Engineer | Staff Software Engineer

about.title: About Me
about.description: Established technical leader with 12+ years of experience in designing, building, and scaling software and data systems in fast-paced enterprise environments. Strong focus on Agentic AI, Generative AI, and Machine Learning frameworks, particularly within the healthcare domain. Expertise in building real-time data pipelines, developing AI-powered solutions, and ensuring HIPAA compliance and factual reliability. Currently serving as AI/ML Engineer at Exact Sciences, where I architect cutting-edge RAG systems, multi-agent frameworks, and conversational AI solutions that drive measurable business impact.
skills: Agentic AI (LangGraph, LangSmith, CrewAI, AutoGen, MCP)
AWS (SageMaker, EKS, Lambda), Azure, Vertex AI
Apache Airflow, FastAPI, Flask, Docker, Kubernetes

highlights.title: Healthcare AI Leader
highlights.description: Architected AURA AI RAG system improving answer accuracy by 16% and reducing latency by 72% at Exact Sciences. Built HIPAA-compliant multi-agent frameworks increasing reporting efficiency by 40%

highlights.title: Production ML Expert
highlights.description: Developed ML models achieving 90% accuracy for patient readmission prediction and 35% efficiency improvement in diagnostic workflows. Engineered HITL systems with >95% accuracy

highlights.title: Enterprise Architecture
highlights.description: Led end-to-end SAP ERP implementations and enterprise integrations. 12+ years building scalable systems across healthcare, genomics, and enterprise domains
